overview_of_class: We will discuss measurable transformations, ergodicity and mixing properties, convergence theorems, and recurrence, as well as applications to problems in combinatorics and number theory.
name: Ergodic Theory
title: WCAS MATH 435-0-41 Ergodic Theory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: We will discuss measurable transformations, ergodicity and mixing properties, convergence theorems, and recurrence, as well as applications to problems in combinatorics and number theory.
